stories.text:
I wish to replicate existing instagram posts in a different language including translating the content of the image as well. The main purpose would be to spread knowledge for those who don’t speak English.

Does anyone have any experience doing this or any suggestions?

Is there any or would you be interested in using such an application that supports my crazy workflow wishes? - The app can list and filter (draft, ready, reposted) the posts of the target channels - The app can keep track of what posts have been translated and reposted - I can click on a button next to any post, then on a new form I can provide the new image, the desc etc - The app can post the translated version to my instagram profile
stories.title: Translating instagram posts (including the image content) and (re)posting them
